sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>Upon missing an opponent with a Lightsaber (Willpower) combat check, the character may spend one triumph or 3 advantage to perform a Move Force power action as a maneuver this turn (the character must still be able to perform maneuvers and still may not perform more than two maneuvers in a turn). The character must have already purchased the Move Force power to use it as part of this ability.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>true</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Force assault</name> <number>TAL0001047</number> <passive_or_active>passive</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-21 23:07:30</sys_created_on> <sys_id>40fe17a0db2e0c542901de90cf9619a0</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-21 23:07:30</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
